Headline: #81W West Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Lipps and the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Lipps and the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
